overview: Roxanne Hall searches the blue movie screen for clues to a satisfying love life. Can it be that true lust and limitless passion only exist in the 2-dimensional, celluloid non-reality of the cinema, only to flicker out with the last frame in some dark, cold theater? Roxanne hopes not! After watching Shay Sweet, Azlea Antistia, Jessica Jewel, and Amaretta perform some exceedingly kinky sexual fantasies, Roxanne catches the real thing in a climatic anal finish with Ian Daniels.
tagline: A Projector Flickers in the Dark When the Passion is Consumed, What Secrets Will be Found in the...
title: Afterglow
